analysis.description:
ICDCOIN (/unique_chucks/24/0x31a9d8d9697a9542189f9848636ad75e57583d0d.sol#6-164) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/24/0x31a9d8d9697a9542189f9848636ad75e57583d0d.sol#76-82)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0x31a9d8d9697a9542189f9848636ad75e57583d0d.sol:
	Contract ICDCOIN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0x31a9d8d9697a9542189f9848636ad75e57583d0d.sol#24-27)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
ICDCOIN.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0x31a9d8d9697a9542189f9848636ad75e57583d0d.sol#10-11)
ICDCOIN.fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0x31a9d8d9697a9542189f9848636ad75e57583d0d.sol#24-27) should be declared external
